Package JGAL

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GAL_BinaryGeneConfig
    The GAL_BinaryGeneConfig is an extension from the GAL_GeneConfig that allows the creation of binary genes using Byte for the strait.
    GAL_CharacterGeneConfig
    The GAL_CharacterGeneConfig is an class for the configuration of a GAL_Gene wich trait is a char
    GAL_Chromosome
    The GAL_Chromosome represents any kind of Chromosome
    GAL_ChromosomeConfig
    The GAL_ChromosomeConfig is a class for the configuration of a GAL_Chromosome
    GAL_ChromosomeMutation
    The GAL_ChromosomeMutation extends from GAL_GeneticOperator and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_ClassicCrossover
    The GAL_ClassicCrossover extends from GAL_Crossover and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_ClassicHandler
    The GAL_ClassicHandler extends from GAL_Handler and it follows the classic Genetic Algorithm structure.
    GAL_ClassicMutation
    The GAL_ClassicMutation extends from GAL_GeneticOperator and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_ClassicRankingSelector
    The GAL_ClassicRankingSelector extends from GAL_RankingSelector and is one of the Selection Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_Configuration
    The GAL_Configuration contains all the configuration data needed for running a GA and the methods that requiere of them.
    GAL_Crossover
    The GAL_Crossover is an abstract class wich extends from the GAL_GeneticOperator and haves auxiliar methods normaly used by the crossover operators.
    GAL_DoubleGeneConfig
    The GAL_DoubleGeneConfig is an extension from the GAL_NumericalGeneConfig that allows the creation of Double genes.
    GAL_FitnessFunction
    The GAL_FitnessFunction is an abstract class for the fitness function.
    GAL_Gene
    The GAL_Gene class represents all type of genes.
    GAL_GeneConfig<T>
    The GAL_GeneConfig is an abstract class for the configuration of a GAL_Gene wich trait is of type T.
    GAL_GeneticOperator
    The GAL_GeneticOperator is an abstract class for the genetic operators.
    GAL_Handler
    The GAL_Handler is an abstract class for the handler of the Genetic Algorithm.
    GAL_IntegerGeneConfig
    The GAL_IntegerGeneConfig is an extension from the GAL_NumericalGeneConfig that allows the creation of Integer genes.
    GAL_Inversion
    The GAL_Inversion extends from GAL_GeneticOperator and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_LinealRankingSelector
    The GAL_LinealRankingSelector extends from GAL_RankingSelector and is one of the Selection Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_ModHandler
    The GAL_ModHandler extends from GAL_Handler and it follows the GAmod structure.
    GAL_MultiPointCrossover
    The GAL_MultiPointCrossover extends from GAL_Crossover and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_NaturalSelector
    The GAL_NaturalSelector is an abstract class for the selection operator.
    GAL_NominalGeneConfig
    The GAL_NominalGeneConfig is an extension from the GAL_GeneConfig that allows the creation of nominal genes using String for the strait.
    GAL_NonLinealRankingSelector
    The GAL_NonLinealRankingSelector extends from GAL_RankingSelector and is one of the Selection Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_NumericalGeneConfig<T extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    The GAL_NumericalGeneConfig is an abstract class for the configuration of a GAL_Gene wich trait is a number
    GAL_Population
    The GAL_Population represents the population of chromosomes for one generation
    GAL_RandomCrossover
    The GAL_RandomCrossover extends from GAL_Crossover and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_RankingSelector
    The GAL_RankingSelector in an abstract class wich extends from GAL_NaturalSelector.
    GAL_RouletteSelector
    The GAL_RouletteSelector extends from GAL_NaturalSelector and is one of the Selection Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_SegmentCrossover
    The GAL_SegmentCrossover extends from GAL_Crossover and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_ShuffleMutation
    The GAL_ShuffleMutation extends from GAL_GeneticOperator and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_SwapMutation
    The GAL_SwapMutation extends from GAL_GeneticOperator and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_TerminationCondition
    The GAL_TerminationCondition is an abstract class for the termination condition.
    GAL_TournamentSelector
    The GAL_TournamentSelector extends from GAL_NaturalSelector and is one of the Selection Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_UniformCrossover
    The GAL_UniformCrossover extends from GAL_Crossover and is one of the Genetic Operators implemented by default.
    GAL_Util
    Group of methods that are usefull for the creation of an Genetic Algorithm
